The sentence hearing for the woman convicted in  for the deaths of three Eastern international students will take place at  p.m PERIOD today PERIOD



On March   Priya Darshini Muppavarapu Anusha Anumolu and Anitha Lakshmi Veerapaneni were traveling on Dougherty Ferry Road in St PERIOD Louis when Christine L PERIOD Miller an offduty police officer driving in the wrong lane crashed into their vehicle according to the St PERIOD Louis Post Dispatch PERIOD

Miller was reportedly intoxicated PERIOD

Miller pleaded guilty to four counts of firstdegree involuntary manslaughter and one count of assault in the second degree on Dec PERIOD   PERIOD

The women were in St PERIOD Louis for spring break visiting Nitesh Adusumill who was the driver of the car and the sole survivor of the crash PERIOD

Scott Rosenblum the attorney representing Miller was not available for comment this week PERIOD

In the past Rosenblum has said he will not comment on the case until after the sentence hearing PERIOD

As the sentencing approaches an Eastern professor remembers the lives of the young women PERIOD

Peter Ling Liu the graduate coordinator in the technology department said the news of the deaths of the three international students deeply saddened him PERIOD

After hearing about the crash Liu remembers being very shocked and saddened though he remembers how supportive the Eastern faculty was PERIOD

The campus community was very supportive for our students after the tragic crash Liu said PERIOD

He said he wanted to thank President Bill Perry and the counseling center at Eastern for all of their support after the womens death PERIOD

Also Liu said he would like to emphasize that Muppavarapu Anumolu and Veerapaneni were excellent students at Eastern and were a great addition to the program PERIOD

Liu said after the crash the technology department was paying close attention to the case and he said he plans to follow the outcome of the sentence hearing closely PERIOD

Many students who knew the women personally have graduated or went home to their countries Liu said PERIOD
